message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust if you'd like.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about a 55/45 split?  The money will be worth less if we wait.
Let's be reasonable, Bob. Inflation is hurting us both.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to move forward.
